org.apache.catalina.deploy

类 ContextHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.deploy.ResourceBase
      • org.apache.catalina.deploy.ContextHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, Injectable

    public class ContextHandler
extends ResourceBase
    Representation of a handler reference for a web service, as represented in a <handler> element in the deployment descriptor.
    作者:
    Fabien Carrion
    另请参阅:
